TITLE: Web Chaos Machine
LICENSE_REGISTER_INTRO_TEXT_02: Fill the gaps below to register and gain access.
LICENSE_REGISTER_FIELD_CLICK_TO_PAY: Click here to pay the license for the address above.
LICENSE_REGISTER_SUCCESS: Machine register success! Please stand by...
LICENSE_REGISTER_ERROR_PAYMENT_NOT_FOUND: Error, no payment has been found with your email.
LICENSE_REGISTER_ERROR: Error to connect in the auth server. Try again later!
BAD_AUTH: It's not possible to access the machine without authentication.
NEED_DISCONNECT_ACCOUNT: Hey!, Can't go through the process of combination while online in game. Come back later!
SELECT_CHARACTER_INTRO_TEXT_01: Welcome to the new Web Chaos Machine of MuXXXXX!
SELECT_CHARACTER_INTRO_TEXT_02: Here you'll be able to do the desired combination in a faster and a simple way. Our Goblin team is always ready to help in anything you'll need. Shall we?
SELECT_CHARACTER_INTRO_TEXT_03: First choose the character with the combination items. Good luck!
MACHINE_ERROR_SELECTED_SLOT_NO_HAVE_ITEM: Selected slot doesn't have an item
MACHINE_MIX_STATUS_NEED_MORE_ITEMS: Hey!, Aren't you forgetting something? Some items are missing! Check again the recipe, and bring back all the necessary materials, in order to make the combination work!
MACHINE_MIX_STATUS_NOT_HAVE_SPACE: I see you have all the necessary material from the recipe. But we have problem... You don't have enought space in your inventory.
MACHINE_MIX_STATUS_SUCCESS: Good news, the combination worked. Congratulations! Your new item is in your inventory.
MACHINE_MIX_STATUS_RATE_FAIL: Bad Luck! We tried in all possible ways to do your combination, but the materials didn't work as expected and the combination failed...
ITEM_OPTION_EXCELLENT_WINGLV3_0: Return's the enemy's attack power in 5%
